title: Graded HOFs FS PART II:  Lajoie McGraw Tinker Huggins
author: bounce

posts.post_title: Graded HOFs FS PART II:  Lajoie McGraw Tinker Huggins
posts.post_content:
Need to move a few old things to make room for a couple new things.

I'll take it takes precedent over any negotiations.

Prices are delivered and net to me, or add 3% for G&S.

Can provide additional pictures if needed, just let me know.

DM or email to [url]david@davidratliff.com[/url]

I would consider some partial trade in certain instances, but needs to be HOF graded and/or liquid enough that I could sell for comp values, as I really do need to raise some funds.

I'm looking for a Cobb Bat Off as well, if someone has one to trade.

Let's do some deals!

Huggins - Cycle PSA 6 - POP 3 none higher - $xxx - PENDING

McGraw SGC 50 - $NLFS
Another SGC 4 sold in Mile High for $639.  Can't believe I still own this.
